import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import classNames from 'classnames' import './Message.scss' const Message = ({ avatar, user, text, date }) => (

{text}

) Message.propTypes = { avatar: PropTypes.string, user: PropTypes.object, text: PropTypes.string, date: PropTypes.string, } Message.defaultProps = { user: {}, } export default Message
